articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: "If That Means Leaving Ashwin Or Jadeja Out...": Dinesh Karthik's Bold Take On India's WTC Final Tea.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: In the World Test Championship final against Australia, both R Ashwin and Ravindra Jadeja might not have a place in India's playing XI.
articles.content: Ravichandran Ashwin and Ravindra Jadeja were unarguably the two biggest heroes for India in the 2-1 Border-Gavaskar Trophy triumph. The two finished as the top wicket-takers, with Ashwin claiming 25 … [+1583 chars]

articles.author: India Today Sports Desk
articles.title: India vs Australia: Why Rohit Sharma and Co would be desperate to win the ODI series against Australia - India Today
articles.description: India and Australia thrilled fans with their performance in the Border-Gavaskar trophy and now the action will switch to the ODI format now. The series will be a very crucial one for Rohit Sharma and Co and nothing more than a win will matter.
articles.content:
By India Today Sports Desk: The Border-Gavaskar trophy truly delivered as India and Australia put on a show for both sets of fans during the course of the four Tests.
